page.title: 07MAINS OF MURTHLY FARM
page.content:
We spoke to Mr.McDairmid about his farm which largely lies on the lower slopes and valley floor of the River Tay around Aberfeldy.
He farms with three full-time workers using modern machinery.At busy times, Mr.McDairmid hires contractors to help with the harvesting,spreading lime, spraying crops and potatoes planting. He plants the 283 hectares as follows: Spring Barley(105) Winter Barley(67) Turnip(11)Peas(20)Oil Seed Rape(8) Oats(12)Hay(12)Vegs(4)and Grass(134).
He uses a lot of fertiliser on the barley with different chemicals for killing weeds and disease on the cereals.
